ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(RecordType.Name = $Setup.WAM_CustomSetting__c.Contact_Distributor_Record_Type_Label__c, !ISBLANK(Phone)), IF(OR(CONTAINS(Phone, "+"), CONTAINS(Phone, "("), CONTAINS(Phone, ")")), IF( LEFT(TRIM(Phone), 1) == "+", IF(!CONTAINS(Phone, "(") || !CONTAINS(Phone, ")"), TRUE, FALSE), IF(LEFT(TRIM(Phone), 1) <> "+", TRUE, FALSE) ), FALSE), FALSE)
